user@joshtorres:~

user@joshtorres:~$ cat joshtorres.txt

Hi, my name is Josh Torres! I am currently studying computer science at UQAM, Montreal, Canada.

I am passionate about low-level programming. My favorite languages are C, C++ and assembly. I also have some web developpement experience. As a logic driven person, I mainly worked with back-end technologies, such as PHP and Nodejs.

So welcome to my personal website, where you will find more information about me. Let's run it!

user@joshtorres:~$ make

gcc -o joshtorres joshtorres.c

user@joshtorres:~$ ./joshtorres

LAUCHING Josh's website (Click or Tap to launch)...

Josh Torres

Programmer, Freelancer, Geek.

ABOUT ME

I currently live in Montreal where I study software engineering at UQAM.

In terms of programming/developpment, low-level programming is my passion. I am especially interested in embedded systems. I am currently working of a small project related to embedded systems.

Some of my technical skills are: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PHP, JAVA, C, C++, Assembly.

I also started to play around with Vuejs and nodejs. Checkout my projects page.
